word:
While studying authors and lesson books parts of the time, students should study with the same application the human machinery, and at the same time demonstrate the fact by using the physical organs in manual labor. Thus 


                                   -221- 

they answer the purpose of their Creator. They become self-made men and women.--Letter 103, 1897, pp. 1, 2. (To E. A. Sutherland, July 23, 1897.)
